00040 #ifndef _particleeffect_cpp
00041 #define _particleeffect_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "particleeffect.h"
00044 #include "scenemanager.h"
00045 
00046 #include <Ogre.h>
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     ParticleEffect::ParticleEffect(const String& Name, const String& Template, SceneManager* manager)
00051     {
00052         Manager = manager;
00053         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00054         OgreParticle = OgreManager->createParticleSystem(Name, Template);
00055         OgreNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode();
00056         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreNode);
00057         SetElementType(Attachable::ParticleEffect);
00058     }
00059 
00060     ParticleEffect::ParticleEffect(Ogre::ParticleSystem* System, SceneManager* manager)
00061     {
00062         OgreParticle = System;
00063         Manager = manager;
00064         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00065         OgreNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode();
00066         OgreManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(OgreNode);
00067         SetElementType(Attachable::ParticleEffect);
00068     }
00069 
00070     ParticleEffect::~ParticleEffect()
00071     {
00072         Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroyParticleSystem(OgreParticle);
00073         Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroySceneNode(OgreNode);
00074     }
00075 
00076     String& ParticleEffect::GetName()
00077     {
00078         return OgreParticle->getName();
00079     }
00080 
00081     void ParticleEffect::EnableParticleEffect()
00082     {
00083         OgreNode->attachObject(OgreParticle);
00084     }
00085 
00086     void ParticleEffect::DisableParticleEffect()
00087     {
00088         OgreNode->detachObject(OgreParticle);
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 #endif
